verses.text: \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* that are \w strong|strong="G1415"\w* \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* to \w bear|strong="G0941"\w* the \w infirmities|strong="G0771"\w* of the \w weak|strong="G0102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G0700"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \add his\add* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \add his\add* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w edification|strong="G3619"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w pleased|strong="G0700"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, The \w reproaches|strong="G3680"\w* of them that \w reproached|strong="G3679"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* whatsoever \w things|strong="G3745"\w* were written aforetime were \w written|strong="G4270"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2251"\w* \w learning|strong="G1319"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3874"\w* of the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w* might \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* \w grant|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* to be \w likeminded|strong="G5426"\w* \w one|strong="G1722"\w* toward \w another|strong="G0240"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w may|strong="G1392"\w* with one \w mind|strong="G3661"\w* \add and\add* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* receive \w ye|strong="G4355"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G4355"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I say \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* of the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w confirm|strong="G0950"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w* \add made\add* unto the \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G1392"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* might \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \add his\add* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w For|strong="G1223"\w* this \w cause|strong="G5124"\w* I will \w confess|strong="G1843"\w* to \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sing|strong="G5567"\w* \w unto|strong="G3686"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Rejoice|strong="G2165"\w*, ye \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w Praise|strong="G0134"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* ye \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laud|strong="G1867"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* ye \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, There shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* a \w root|strong="G4491"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="G2421"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that shall \w rise|strong="G0450"\w* to reign \w over|strong="G0757"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*; \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G1679"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w trust|strong="G1679"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w fill|strong="G4137"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G5479"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w believing|strong="G4100"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* am \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G2075"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w full|strong="G3324"\w* of \w goodness|strong="G0019"\w*, \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w with|strong="G1108"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w admonish|strong="G3560"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, I have \w written|strong="G1125"\w* the more \w boldly|strong="G5112"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G0575"\w* some \w sort|strong="G3313"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w putting|strong="G1878"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* in \w mind|strong="G1878"\w*, because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* that is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w That|strong="G1519"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* should \w be|strong="G1511"\w* the \w minister|strong="G3011"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w ministering|strong="G2418"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the offering \w up|strong="G4376"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* might \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G2144"\w*, being \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* whereof I may \w glory|strong="G2746"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w in|strong="G2746"\w* those things which \w pertain|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w will|strong="G5111"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w dare|strong="G5111"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* of any of those \w things|strong="G5100"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w hath|strong="G2716"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w wrought|strong="G2716"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*, to \w make|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w obedient|strong="G5218"\w*, by \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w deed|strong="G2041"\w*,

\w Through|strong="G1722"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1411"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* round \w about|strong="G2945"\w* \w unto|strong="G3360"\w* \w Illyricum|strong="G2437"\w*, I have fully \w preached|strong="G4137"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* have I \w strived|strong="G5389"\w* to preach the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* was \w named|strong="G3687"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* I should \w build|strong="G3618"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* another \w man’s|strong="G0245"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G0312"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w spoken|strong="G0312"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w*, they shall \w see|strong="G3700"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w have|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* shall \w understand|strong="G4920"\w*.

For which \w cause|strong="G1352"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* I have \w been|strong="G1465"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w hindered|strong="G1465"\w* from \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* no \w more|strong="G3371"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G5125"\w* \w parts|strong="G2824"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a great \w desire|strong="G1974"\w* \w these|strong="G0575"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*;

\w Whensoever|strong="G1437"\w* I take my \w journey|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Spain|strong="G4681"\w*, I will \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* to \w see|strong="G2300"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* in my \w journey|strong="G1279"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to be brought on my \w way|strong="G4311"\w* \w thitherward|strong="G1563"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* I \w be|strong="G1705"\w* \w somewhat|strong="G3313"\w* filled \w with|strong="G1705"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \add company\add*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* I \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* to \w minister|strong="G1247"\w* unto the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it hath pleased \w them|strong="G2106"\w* of \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w* to \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w a|strong="G2842"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w contribution|strong="G2842"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

It hath pleased \w them|strong="G2106"\w* \w verily|strong="G1063"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w debtors|strong="G3781"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* have been made partakers \w of|strong="G2841"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* spiritual \w things|strong="G4152"\w*, their duty \w is|strong="G3784"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w minister|strong="G3008"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* carnal \w things|strong="G4559"\w*.

\w When|strong="G2005"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* I have \w performed|strong="G2005"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w*, I will \w come|strong="G0565"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Spain|strong="G4681"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* I am \w sure|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, when I \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, I shall \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* of the \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, for \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, that ye strive \w together|strong="G4865"\w* with \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add your\add* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* I may be \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* them that do not \w believe|strong="G0544"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w service|strong="G1248"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add I have\add* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w accepted|strong="G2144"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* I may \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* may \w with|strong="G4875"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* be \w refreshed|strong="G4875"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
